DOC.brief_summary: The French cooperative group GINECO proposes to implement an observational study to describe a real situation, in daily practice tolerance and methods of administration of bevacizumab (Avastin ®)
DOC.brief_title: First Line Ovarian Cancer Treatment - Cohort Study
DOC.detailed_description: Population: Patients aged 18 years and older with an epithelial ovarian cancer, fallopian tube or primary peritoneal or witch it was decided to initiate a process comprising of Bevacizumab (Avastin ®) in first-line therapy
DOC.criteria: Patients aged 18 years and over, Patients with an epithelial ovarian cancer, fallopian tube or peritoneal who will receive bevacizumab (Avastin ®) in firstline therapy Patients should be informed of the study orally and should not have any objection their data to be processed. Patient participation in a clinical trial Patient nonaffiliated to a social security scheme.
